the fact of not having your gender match the physical body you were born with: In the therapeutic clinic, transsexuality is usually considered a medical condition.
the fact of having had medical treatment to change your sex: The applicant requested a change in the legislation so that his transsexuality could remain secret. Note: This word is used in older technical and medical writing and is not as common today.See
